shortdesc.ph: Sets the data format for the callback.

section.p: When calling to register an audio frame observer, you need to implement this callback. The SDK triggers this callback, and you can set the audio format in the return value of this callback.
section.note: The SDK triggers the callback based on the sampling interval calculation formula you set in the return value. Sampling interval (seconds) = samplePerCall / (sampleRate × channel). Make sure the sampling interval is ≥ 0.01 seconds.

section.title: Return Values
section.p: Audio format for ear monitoring. See .
